children.header: Rituals for subjugating [various kinds of spirits]
Rituals to bring [spirits] under one’s control

nested_captions.content: Exorcism usually serves to turn back attacks that have already taken place; in extreme cases, this involves the use of destructive rituals.

summaries.content:
This category overlaps with "Protection rituals" (bsrung) and "Destruction rituals" (grol, bsad), as the three form a common triad bsrung bzlog bsad gsum.

Protection rituals usually anticipate the attack of opposing forces, providing a first line of defense before an attack takes place. Exorcisms, on the other hand, usually serve to turn back attacks that have already taken place. In extreme cases, enemies (humans or spirits) may be killed using destructive rituals. 

The "Exorcism" Knowledge Map category is also used for "ransom" rituals, which often use effigies to repurchase one's soul or life-force.
